snippet.title: DEAD LETTER DEPT. Teaser Trailer - Atmospheric Typing Horror
snippet.description:
wishlist DEAD LETTER DEPT on STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1627350/Dead_Letter_Dept/?utm_source=YTTeaser1

DEAD LETTER DEPT. is a short horror game mystery experience coming to Steam, where you use your computer keyboard to type in various prompts, and attempt to decipher damaged images as oddities begin to appear.

Day to day, you go to work & process the images displayed on your terminal, and type up whatever text is in front of you. Whatever can be made out, that is. Letters and lost mail, some mangled and twisted, that have travelled from place to place with nowhere else to go. Sometimes the mail you receive is a little strange. Sometimes, it feels like it's talking to you directly through the screen...

FOLLOW development on DEAD LETTER DEPT:
https://mailchi.mp/8e509a7114eb/dead-letter-dept

-----------------------
Belief Engine on the web:
http://www.beliefengine.com

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BeliefEngine
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BeliefEngine/
